overview: Bent-nose LaSalle is a gangster feared by everyone --except his brazen girlfriend Blaze. When he hires two thugs, Tony and Vinny to watch over his red-haired flame, she takes them on one unforgettable ride they won't soon forget. Adult's Award-winning film makers Armstrong and Steel present "Blaze". Melissa Hill's scorching return to adult, in which she proves that crime doesn't pay. And hard time should be in bed.
title: Blaze
